price: 118. Marka xaqii baa sugnaaday, oo baabba' iyo balaan jirin waxaa noqday waxay falayeen.
arabic: فَوَقَعَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fawaqaʿa al-ḥaqu wabaṭala mā kānū yaʿmalūna
